short_description: MOISTURIZING HEEL CREAM: Made with rich Argan Oil, Heel Rescue is specially formulated to penetrate, moisturize and repair even the toughest cracks and callouses; Great for feet, heels, elbows, knees, and hands

FOOTCARE EXPERTS: We know foot pain and discomfort can stop you from walking, running, working, standing, or whatever you need to do, that's why we make the highest quality products with the best materials

product_description: Give your feet the TLC they deserve with Heal & Rescue Foot Cream. Crafted by a family-founded Brooklyn footcare brand since 1986, this ultra-rich cream combines argan oil, squalene, and vitamin E to deeply penetrate and repair cracked heels, callouses, and dry patches on feet, elbows, knees, and hands. Supplied in two 16 oz bottles, this unscented and non-greasy formulation absorbs quickly, leaving skin supple and silky—minus any oily residue. Clinically proven to deliver visible improvements in hydration and smoothness within minutes, it’s your go‑to solution for long-lasting moisture and comfort. Ideal for everyday use by those with dry or neglected skin, and excellent for athletes, outdoor enthusiasts, and anyone on their feet all day.

name: Flexitol Heel Balm Twin Pack, Cracked Heel Cream & Foot Balm, Intensive Hydration for Dry, Rough Feet & Heels, Urea-Based Moisturizing Cream, 4 oz Tube
short_description: VALUE TWIN PACK –Double the heel relief and better value with this convenient twin pack.
VISIBLE RESULTS IN 1 DAY – Clinically tested to hydrate and soften cracked heels and rough feet fast.
25% UREA FORMULA – High-strength urea deeply moisturizes while gently exfoliating thick, hardened skin.
INTENSIVE FOOT CARE – Helps restore severely dry, cracked heels and callused feet.
NON-GREASY TEXTURE – Absorbs quickly without sticky residue, suitable for day or night use.

product_description: Product Description Flexitol Heel Balm is an intensive foot solution designed to restore dry, cracked, and rough heels. Formulated with a powerful 25% urea concentration, this clinically tested cream penetrates deep into the skin to soften thick, hardened areas while restoring moisture where it is needed most. Enriched with Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Lanolin, Glycolic Acid, and Tea Tree Oil, the formula nourishes, exfoliates, and soothes dry skin. With regular use, Flexitol Heel Balm helps improve skin texture, reduce rough patches, and restore softness to tired feet. Its non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, making it ideal for daily use. Suitable for diabetic feet and sensitive skin, this heel balm twin pack delivers fast-acting relief twice over, visible improvement and long-lasting hydration for healthier-looking feet. How to Use Apply to clean, dry feet, focusing on heels and rough areas. Massage until absorbed. Use daily or as needed. Key Ingredients 25% Urea – Deep hydration and exfoliation Aloe Vera & Shea Butter – Moisturize and soothe skin Vitamin E & Lanolin – Nourish and protect Safety Information For external use only Discontinue use if irritation occurs Keep out of reach of children Additional Details APMA Seal of Approval Non-greasy, fast-absorbing Suitable for diabetic feet 4 oz tube

product_description: Get visibly healthier feet in just 1 night with Kerasal Nighttime Intensive Foot Repair. This highly concentrated skin healing ointment is a skincare product that offers the benefits of a foot cream for dry cracked heels and feet to help heal dry skin and renew healthy looking skin for people with cracked heels and people on their feet all day. This feet moisturizer for cracked feet contains salicylic acid, urea and soft white petrolatum, lavender and chamomile for soft smooth feet. Kerasal’s foot exfoliator and moisturizer doesn’t just cover up dry skin with moisture. It repairs dry heels and cracked feet by gently loosening and removing dry skin on the soles, allowing the moisturizers to penetrate deeply. With Kerasal’s dry skin ointment, users saw better results than their previous foot cream. Kerasal cracked foot lotion heal cracked heels fast while you sleep, providing overnight improvement when used as part of your bedtime routine. Apply before bed and wake up in the morning with baby soft feet. This heel moisturizer for cracked heels is easy to use at home or while traveling, and may also be used by a caregiver providing foot care support. In addition to foot ointment, Kerasal offers a variety of foot care products, including Kerasal Nighttime Intensive Repair Foot Masks and Kerasal Nighttime Renewal Fungal Nail Patches.

GUARANTEE: if you are not fully satisfied, we will refund 100% of the purchase price. Please retain product and call 1-800-275-2718 for replacement product or refund. SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn.
